name: Mars 2020 Rover
description: NASA's Mars 2020 rover, Perseverance, landed on Mars to search for signs of ancient life.

name: Lunar Gateway
description: A collaborative project involving NASA, ESA, JAXA, and CSA to build a lunar space station.

name: China's Chang'e-5
description: China's Chang'e-5 mission successfully landed on the Moon and brought back lunar samples.

name: James Webb Space Telescope
description: The JWST is the most powerful space telescope designed to explore the universe from infrared wavelengths.

name: Mars Sample Return
description: A collaborative mission to return samples collected from Mars back to Earth.

name: ESA's ExoMars
description: ExoMars is a joint mission between ESA and Roscosmos, aimed at searching for signs of past life on Mars.

name: Artemis I
description: NASA's first mission in the Artemis program, aimed at returning humans to the Moon.

name: Indian Mars Orbiter Mission (MOM)
description: India's Mars Orbiter Mission, also called Mangalyaan, is designed to explore the surface and atmosphere of Mars.

name: Venus Express
description: Venus Express was a mission by the European Space Agency to explore Venus from orbit.

name: SpaceX Starship
description: SpaceX's Starship is a fully reusable spacecraft designed for missions to Mars, the Moon, and beyond.
